001package reciprocal.number.fraction;
002
003import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument;
004import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
005
006import com.google.common.math.BigIntegerMath;
007import java.io.Serial;
008import java.io.Serializable;
009import java.math.BigDecimal;
010import java.math.BigInteger;
011import java.math.MathContext;
012import java.util.Comparator;
013import java.util.function.BiFunction;
014import java.util.stream.Stream;
015import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
016
017/**
018 * Immutable implementation of a fraction that uses {@link BigFraction} as type
019 * for its numerator and denominator
020 * <p>
021 * The returned Fractions of most methods are neither normalized nor reduced.
022 *
023 * @since 0.0.1
024 */
025public final class BigFraction extends
026    AbstractFraction<@NotNull BigInteger, @NotNull BigFraction, @NotNull BigDecimal> {
027    /**
028     * 0
029     *
030     * @since 0.0.1
031     */
032    public static final BigFraction ZERO = ofNumerator(BigInteger.ZERO);
033
034    /**
035     * 1
036     *
037     * @since 0.0.1
038     */
039    public static final BigFraction ONE = ofNumerator(BigInteger.ONE);
040
041    /**
042     * Units
043     *
044     * @since 0.0.1
045     */
046    public static final Stream<BigFraction> UNITS =
047        Stream.iterate(ONE, bf -> ofDenominator(bf.getDenominator().add(BigInteger.ONE)));
048
049    @Serial
050    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
051
052    /**
053     * Constructor
054     *
055     * @param numerator numerator
056     * @param denominator denominator
057     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code numerator == null}
058     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code denominator == null}
059     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code denominator == 0}
060     * @since 0.0.1
061     */
062    public BigFraction(final @NotNull BigInteger numerator, final @NotNull BigInteger denominator) {
063        super(numerator, denominator);
064        checkArgument(denominator.compareTo(BigInteger.ZERO) != 0,
065            "denominator expected not to be 0 but denominator = %s", denominator);
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * Static factory method
070     *
071     * @param numerator numerator
072     * @return numerator / 1
073     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code numerator == null}
074     * @since 0.0.1
075     */
076    public static @NotNull BigFraction ofNumerator(final @NotNull BigInteger numerator) {
077        return new BigFraction(numerator, BigInteger.ONE);
078    }
079
080    /**
081     * Static factory method
082     *
083     * @param denominator denominator
084     * @return 1 / denominator
085     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code denominator == null}
086     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code denominator == 0}
087     * @since 0.0.1
088     */
089    public static @NotNull BigFraction ofDenominator(final @NotNull BigInteger denominator) {
090        return new BigFraction(BigInteger.ONE, denominator);
091    }
092
093    @Override
094    public boolean isInvertible() {
095        return getNumerator().compareTo(BigInteger.ZERO) != 0;
096    }
097
098    @Override
099    public boolean isUnit() {
100        return getNumerator().compareTo(BigInteger.ONE) == 0;
101    }
102
103    @Override
104    public boolean isDyadic() {
105        return BigIntegerMath.isPowerOfTwo(getDenominator());
106    }
107
108    @Override
109    public boolean isIrreducible() {
110        return getNumerator().abs().gcd(getDenominator().abs()).compareTo(BigInteger.ONE) == 0;
111    }
112
113    @Override
114    public boolean isProper() {
115        return getNumerator().abs().compareTo(getDenominator().abs()) < 0;
116    }
117
118    @Override
119    public int getSignum() {
120        return getNumerator().signum() * getDenominator().signum();
121    }
122
123    @Override
124    public @NotNull BigFraction add(final @NotNull BigFraction summand) {
125        requireNonNull(summand, "summand");
126        final var num =
127            summand.getDenominator().multiply(getNumerator())
128                .add(getDenominator().multiply(summand.getNumerator()));
129        final var den = getDenominator().multiply(summand.getDenominator());
130        return new BigFraction(num, den);
131    }
132
133    @Override
134    public @NotNull BigFraction subtract(final @NotNull BigFraction subtrahend) {
135        requireNonNull(subtrahend, "subtrahend");
136        final var num = subtrahend.getDenominator().multiply(getNumerator())
137            .subtract(getDenominator().multiply(subtrahend.getNumerator()));
138        final var den = getDenominator().multiply(subtrahend.getDenominator());
139        return new BigFraction(num, den);
140    }
141
142    @Override
143    public @NotNull BigFraction multiply(final @NotNull BigFraction factor) {
144        requireNonNull(factor, "factor");
145        return new BigFraction(
146            getNumerator().multiply(factor.getNumerator()),
147            getDenominator().multiply(factor.getDenominator())
148        );
149    }
150
151    @Override
152    public @NotNull BigFraction negate() {
153        return new BigFraction(getNumerator().negate(), getDenominator());
154    }
155
156    @Override
157    public @NotNull BigFraction abs() {
158        return new BigFraction(getNumerator().abs(), getDenominator().abs());
159    }
160
161    @Override
162    public @NotNull BigFraction expand(final @NotNull BigInteger number) {
163        return new BigFraction(number.multiply(getNumerator()), number.multiply(getDenominator()));
164    }
165
166    @Override
167    public boolean lessThanOrEqualTo(final @NotNull BigFraction other) {
168        requireNonNull(other, "other");
169        final var normalized = normalize();
170        final var normalizedOther = other.normalize();
171        final var left = normalizedOther.getDenominator().multiply(normalized.getNumerator());
172        final var right = normalized.getDenominator().multiply(normalizedOther.getNumerator());
173        return left.compareTo(right) < 1;
174    }
175
176    @Override
177    public @NotNull BigFraction normalize() {
178        if (getSignum() < 0 && getNumerator().compareTo(BigInteger.ZERO) > 0) {
179            return new BigFraction(getNumerator().negate(), getDenominator().abs());
180        }
181        if (getSignum() < 0) {
182            return this;
183        }
184        if (getSignum() == 0) {
185            return ZERO;
186        }
187        return abs();
188    }
189
190    @Override
191    public @NotNull BigFraction reduce() {
192        final var gcd = getNumerator().gcd(getDenominator()).abs();
193        return new BigFraction(getNumerator().divide(gcd), getDenominator().divide(gcd));
194    }
195
196    @Override
197    public @NotNull BigDecimal toBigDecimal() {
198        return new BigDecimal(getNumerator()).divide(new BigDecimal(getDenominator()), MathContext.DECIMAL128);
199    }
200
201    @Override
202    public int compareTo(final @NotNull BigFraction o) {
203        return BigFractionComparator.INSTANCE.compare(this, o);
204    }
205
206    @Override
207    protected @NotNull BigFraction getOne() {
208        return ONE;
209    }
210
211    @Override
212    protected @NotNull BiFunction<BigInteger, BigInteger, BigFraction> getConstructor() {
213        return BigFraction::new;
214    }
215
216    /**
217     * Comparator
218     *
219     * @since 0.0.1
220     */
221    public static final class BigFractionComparator implements Comparator<BigFraction>, Serializable {
222        /**
223         * Instance
224         *
225         * @since 0.0.1
226         */
227        public static final BigFractionComparator INSTANCE = new BigFractionComparator();
228
229        @Serial
230        private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
231
232        private BigFractionComparator() {
233        }
234
235        @Override
236        public int compare(final @NotNull BigFraction o1, final @NotNull BigFraction o2) {
237            requireNonNull(o1, "o1");
238            requireNonNull(o2, "o2");
239            if (o1.lessThan(o2)) {
240                return -1;
241            }
242            if (o1.greaterThan(o2)) {
243                return 1;
244            }
245            return 0;
246        }
247    }
248}
